casebody.data:
CAROLINA MARLIN CLUB MARINA ASSOCIATION, INC. d/b/a Morehead-Beaufort Yacht Club.
v.
Harry PREDDY and Valerie Preddy. No. 46P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Amie Fluber, for Preddy, Harry, et al. C.R. Wheatly, III, Beaufort, for Carolina Marlin Club Marina Association, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 30th of January 2015 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
